snippet: Adel Borghei, an Iranian umpire and referee, was selected to work at the United States Open — and then he wasn’t.
abstract: Adel Borghei, Iranian umpire and referee who was selected to work at the United States Open tennis tournament, is unable to begin job because of United States' sanctions against Iran; retaining services of an Iranian resident is prohibited in the United States unless without proper authorization.
lead_paragraph: Adel Borghei, an Iranian umpire and referee, was selected to work at the United States Open — and then he wasn’t.

headline.main: Sanctions Against Iran Mean a Tennis Referee Can’t Work at the Open
headline.print_headline: Sanctions Against Iran Mean a Tennis Referee Can’t Work at the Open
